recipesJson.name: Caught in the Rain
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: A pina colada. WF coconut rum is a great Malibu style rum. The pear is there for sweetness and orange for depth. Vanilla swirl is there to keep the sharp edges at bay. Off the shake the sweetness from the fruits are there and after a few days the coconut really shines.
